World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest world news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ 2024 年 2 月 7 日星期三 09:12:25 GMT 120
What UNRWA crisis means for Palestinian refugees beyond GazaThe prospect of the U.N. agency for Palestinians (UNRWA) being forced to shut down services by the end of February is deepening despair in refugee camps across the Middle East, where it has long provided a lifeline for millions of people. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 09:06:52 GMT IHACA7RNKJLL7M6XY5T7JHUMVI https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/what-unrwa-crisis-means-palestinian-refugees-beyond-gaza-2024-02-07/Emilie Madi, Suleiman Al-Khalidi世界中东
Swiss foreign minister hopes China can 'give us a hand' in Ukraine peace talksSwiss Foreign Minister Ignazio Cassis said on Wednesday he hoped China would "give us a hand" in Ukraine peace talks, after Switzerland last month agreed to host a global peace summit on Ukraine. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 09:04:01 GMT YGQNKQWXABIEBP77HDDRZBXXBM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/swiss-foreign-minister-hopes-china-can-give-us-hand-ukraine-peace-talks-2024-02-07/Reuters世界欧洲
Czech government to evaluate merits of joining 'euro waiting room'The Czech government will evaluate the merits of joining the ERM II exchange rate mechanism, a currency flotation band that aspiring countries must spend two years in before joining the euro zone, ruling parties' leaders agreed late on Tuesday. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 08:58:43 GMT PEYMAW5WERKXDNIKU5F5A54UKI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/czech-government-evaluate-merits-joining-euro-waiting-room-2024-02-07/Reuters世界欧洲
Shift from El Nino to La Nina portends rains in Asia, dryness in AmericasAfter a strong El Nino, global weather is poised to transition to La Nina in the second half of 2024, a pattern typically bringing higher precipitation to Australia, Southeast Asia and India and drier weather to grain and oilseed producing regions of the Americas, meteorologists and agricultural analysts said. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 08:35:51 GMT LKQFYUKGYROU7KU3ODVWE5W5XI https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/shift-el-nino-la-nina-portends-rains-asia-dryness-americas-2024-02-07/Naveen Thukral, Julie Ingwersen世界美洲
Twelve trapped on rollercoaster at Hong Kong DisneylandTwelve people are trapped on a rollercoaster in Hong Kong's Disneyland after the ride stopped working on Wednesday afternoon, with rescue operations continuing, police and fire services said as they deployed dozens of personnel to the site. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 08:35:20 GMT 6TET3S5SCRPLRBJR2WYYTFPPQM https://www.reuters.com/world/china/twelve-trapped-rollercoaster-hong-kong-disneyland-2024-02-07/Reuters世界中国
Australia to allow workers to ignore after-hours calls from bossesAustralia will introduce laws giving workers the right to ignore unreasonable calls and messages from their bosses outside of work hours without penalty, with potential fines for employers that breach the rule. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 08:05:51 GMT XYL4HW22GBLCFGAINYDH6LCBMI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/australia-allow-workers-ignore-after-hours-calls-bosses-2024-02-07/Praveen Menon商业工作世界
Ghana LGBTQ+ activists see church blessings as distant luxuryIn a country where religious leaders openly condemn homosexuality and gay sex is punishable with jail time, Ghanaian couple Kay and Naa Shika fear more for their lives and safety than whether a church will bless their same-sex union. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 08:04:21 GMT XYDPJP54SBPW3LIMFARC6QFT5I https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/ghana-lgbtq-activists-see-church-blessings-distant-luxury-2024-02-07/Maxwell Adombila世界非洲
Eight killed in blast in southwestern Pakistan - officialAt least eight people were killed and several injured in a blast outside a political party's office in southwestern Pakistan's Balochistan region on Wednesday, authorities said. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 07:51:31 GMT NZ5LUUYWRBICNNLMRM44C3PI4Y https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/eight-killed-blast-southwestern-pakistan-official-2024-02-07/Reuters世界亚太地区
EU Parliament strips former VP Eva Kaili of immunity in fraud caseThe European Parliament on Tuesday afternoon stripped its former vice-president Eva Kaili of her immunity, clearing the way for an investigation of Kaili's alleged involvement in a 150,000 euro ($161,355) EU budget fraud case from 2015. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 07:28:17 GMT 6K2Z4Q3SVZO7VPMP3W6TWF7BGQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/eu-parliament-strips-former-vp-eva-kaili-immunity-fraud-case-2024-02-07/Reuters世界欧洲
Exclusive: Hamas proposes three-stage ceasefire over 135 days, leading to end of warHamas has proposed a ceasefire plan that would quiet the guns in Gaza for four-and-a-half months leading to an end to the war, in response to a proposal sent last week by Qatari and Egyptian mediators and backed by the United States and Israel. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 07:08:21 GMT LH44A2NNEVMFNO7O57UKJ5NEXU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/hamas-seeks-prisoner-hostage-exchange-withdrawal-israeli-forces-ceasefire-2024-02-07/Samia Nakhoul, Andrew Mills世界中东
Blasts near Pakistan candidates' offices kill 22 on eve of electionTwo blasts took place near electoral candidates' offices in Pakistan's southwestern province of Balochistan, local officials said on Wednesday, killing 22 people and raising concerns over security in the lead up to Thursday's polls. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 06:32:59 GMT MZQADQ46RZI4BI4JQOEMK4BBKU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/jail-pakistans-imran-khan-asks-supporters-wait-by-poll-stations-after-vote-2024-02-07/Charlotte Greenfield, Asif Shahzad世界亚太地区
